title: Single of the Week: Aloe Blacc – I Need a Dollar
body:
This weeks belated single of the week is most likely my favourite single of the year.

It goes by way of Aloe Blacc, with his soulful number **I Need a Dollar**, first single from his upcoming sophomore solo album **Good Things**, to be released on Stones Throw Records.

Reminiscent of 70’s soul, the track is stirring, bluesy and instantly likeable. **I Need a Dollar** sets a very high standard for **Good Things**, which could well turn out to be a truly memorable modern soul LP.
